column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.3
#T_SP=custom.Span|label
#T_RL=custom.Relation|label|BT_custom.Span
#Text=Memorandum of Nuisance from any other cause or general remarks.
#Text=In considering the question of nuisances from offensive
#Text=trades it might be an infraction of personal liberty to
#Text=interfere with a proprietor ' s right to make offensive smells
#Text=within the limits of his own tenement, and for his own
#Text=separate inhalation, but surely it is a greater infraction of
#Text=personal liberty when the proprietor assumes what is
#Text=equivalent to a sole possession of the atmosphere, and
#Text=claims the right of diffusing through it some nauseous
#Text=effluvium which others equally with himself are thus
#Text=obliged to inhale.
#Text=Nuisances arising from offensive trades affect some
#Text=inspectors more than others, but no offensive business
#Text=can be established without the sanction of the London
#Text=County Council in the Metropolis, or an urban sanitary
#Text=authority in the provinces.
#Text=In London, the County
#Text=Council is required to give at least 14 days '  notice to
#Text=the sanitary authority of the district where the premises
#Text=requiring the license are situate, to enable the latter, if
#Text=necessary, to oppose the application.
#Text=In Scotland offensive businesses cannot be established
#Text=without the sanction of the Local Authority, whatever be
#Text=the situation of the business ; and as regards slaughter
#Text=houses and knackers '  yards, a Hcense must be obtained
#Text=from such Authority before they can be carried on, and
#Text=this license is subject to annual renewal.
#Text=The Local Government Board and the London County
#Text=Council have made by-laws for regulating these businesses,
#Text=and these must be enforced by the sanitary authority
#Text=in the Provinces, and the County Council within the
#Text=Metropolis.
#Text=The Act provides that : —
#Text=
#Text=If any person —
#Text=
#Text=Establishes anew the following businesses, or any of them ; that is to
#Text=say, the business of blood boiler, bone boiler, manure manufacturer,
#Text=soap boiler, tallow melter, or knacker, or
#Text=
#Text=Establishes anew, without the sanction of the county council, the
#Text=following businesses or any of them ; that is to say, the business of
#Text=fellmonger, tripe boiler, slaughterer of cattle or horses, or any other
#Text=business which the county council may declare by order confirmed by the Local Government Board, and published in the London
#Text=Gazette to be an offensive business
